(4/3) [rapport 1.33]

ffmpeg -i $filename  -b:v 1500k -b:a 128k -vcodec libx264 -acodec aac -s 320x240

ffmpeg -i $filename  -b:v 1500k -b:a 128k -vcodec libx264 -acodec aac -s 320x180
